name: libxscrnsaver
description: XScreenSaver - X11 Screen Saver extension client library

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: scrnsaverproto
dependencies.description:
MIT Screen Saver Extension. This extension defines a protocol to control
screensaver features and also to query screensaver info on specific
windows.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependent_to.name: beforelight
dependent_to.description:
The beforelight program is a sample implementation of a screen saver for
X servers supporting the MIT-SCREEN-SAVER extension. It is only
recommended for use as a code sample, as it does not include features
such as screen locking or configurability.

dependent_to.name: tk
dependent_to.description:
Tk is a graphical user interface toolkit that takes developing desktop
applications to a higher level than conventional approaches. Tk is the
standard GUI not only for Tcl, but for many other dynamic languages, and
can produce rich, native applications that run unchanged across Windows,
Mac OS X, Linux and more.
